text: "Karma Chameleon" is a 1983 song by English new wave band Culture Club. It is the second single from their second studio album Colour by Numbers. It topped the single charts in Australia, Belgium, Canada, Ireland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Culture Club songs
title: Karma Chameleon
